testsuite.name: snake.basic.GrowthTests

testcase.name: testGrow

failure.message:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: After eating the apple, the snake should grow by one cell per step, for three steps. This means that the tail should not be shortened for three steps. The new food should be placed as soon as the previous food is eaten. The snake should grow after eating the apple, it should not already have grown in the frame where the head of the snake eats the apple (and a new apple is placed). -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=1, actions=<> Want | Got ✓ ----------------------- OO>.A..... | OO>.A..... .......... | ..........
step=1, rand=1, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ ----------------------- .OO>A..... | .OO>A..... .......... | ..........
step=2, rand=10, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ----------------------- ..OO>..... | .OOO>..... ...A...... | ...A......
step=3, rand=10, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ----------------------- ..OOO>.... | .OOOO>.... ...A...... | ...A......
step=4, rand=10, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ----------------------- ..OOOO>... | .OOOOO>... ...A...... | ...A......
step=5, rand=10, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ ----------------------- ..OOOOO>.. | ..OOOOO>.. ...A...... | ...A......
step=6, rand=10, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ ----------------------- ...OOOOO>. | ...OOOOO>. ...A...... | ...A......
step=7, rand=10, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ ----------------------- ....OOOOO> | ....OOOOO> ...A...... | ...A......

testcase.name: testGrowTwice
testcase.failure:
org.scalatest.exceptions.TestFailedException: didPass was false Hint: If a new apple is eaten before the snake has fully grown from the last apple, the effect is stacked. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This is what went wrong:
step=0, rand=0, actions=<> Want | Got ✓ ------------------------------- OO>A.......... | OO>A.......... .............. | ..............
step=1, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------------------------- .OO>.A........ | OOO>.A........ .............. | ..............
step=2, rand=2, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------------------------- .OOO>A........ | OOOO>A........ .............. | ..............
step=3, rand=10, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------------------------- .OOOO>........ | OOOOO>........ .A............ | .A............
step=4, rand=10, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------------------------- .OOOOO>....... | OOOOOO>....... .A............ | .A............
step=5, rand=10, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------------------------- .OOOOOO>...... | OOOOOOO>...... .A............ | .A............
step=6, rand=10, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✗ ------------------------------- .OOOOOOO>..... | OOOOOOOO>..... .A............ | .A............
step=7, rand=10, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ ------------------------------- .OOOOOOOO>.... | .OOOOOOOO>.... .A............ | .A............
step=8, rand=10, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ ------------------------------- ..OOOOOOOO>... | ..OOOOOOOO>... .A............ | .A............
step=9, rand=10, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ ------------------------------- ...OOOOOOOO>.. | ...OOOOOOOO>.. .A............ | .A............
step=10, rand=10, actions=<Step> Want | Got ✓ ------------------------------- ....OOOOOOOO>. | ....OOOOOOOO>. .A............ | .A............
